sentences: Kui me oma ühistule jalgu alla ei saa, tuleb meil varsti pillid kotta panna.
Pärast kaotust tuli meeskonnal pillid kotti panna ja koju sõida.
Vihma hakkas sadama, kuid ega talgulised seepärast veel pille kotti pannud' ei jätnud tööd pooleli'.
context: The word 'jätnud' appears to be related to the expression 'pille kotta panna' (pack pills into a bag), which means to put an end to activities or to pack things away. It's used when someone decides to stop doing something, often after realizing it's not working out. The word form 'jätnud' suggests it might be a participle form related to this expression.
